items.title: Personalized Product Recommendations
items.description: Implement an AI-driven recommendation engine that suggests products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 personalized product suggestions on the homepage for logged-in users.
Recommendations update in real-time based on recent user activity.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate improvement over baseline.
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users without performance degradation.
AI model retraining should occur at least once every 24 hours.

notes: Assumed the requirement focuses on personalized recommendations for logged-in users; specifics about AI model type, data sources, and privacy compliance were not provided.
